title: Launch of Hubble Telescope
description: NASA launches the Hubble Space Telescope, revolutionizing astronomy.

title: Facebook Founded
description: Mark Zuckerberg launches Facebook from his Harvard dorm room.

title: Moon Landing
description: Neil Armstrong becomes the first human to step on the Moon.

title: Fall of Berlin Wall
description: The Berlin Wall falls, symbolizing the end of the Cold War.

title: First iPhone Released
description: Apple releases the first iPhone, changing mobile technology forever.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
description: The world faces a global pandemic, impacting all aspects of life.

title: Windows 95 Launch
description: Microsoft launches Windows 95, a major milestone in PC history.

title: Curiosity Rover Lands on Mars
description: NASA's Curiosity rover lands on Mars to explore the planet's surface.
